testcase.name: Filtering deals using single parameter row
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to login page..........................................passed When User enters valid login credentials....................................passed And User selects Show Filter option from Deals section......................passed Then User should be redirected to Filter dashboard..........................passed When User selects title, operator and vlaue fields..........................passed Then Deals should be filtered accordingly and displayed.....................passed

testcase.name: Clearing filters
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to login page..........................................passed When User enters valid login credentials....................................passed And User selects Show Filter option from Deals section......................passed Then User should be redirected to Filter dashboard..........................passed When User clicks on clear icon from dashboard...............................passed Then User should get redirected to deals dashboard..........................passed
